page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: The{Northern Ireland Housing Executive has two estates in Eglinton - at St. Canice's Park and Dunverne Gardens. There are two, three and four bedroom houses and a few bungalows for old age pensioners. In MIll Path there are the same type of houses which serve as married quarters for soldiers based in Londonderry. More and more people are now buying their own houses and a lot of private housing is being erected. Chalet type houses are going up at Woodvale Road, Carnmoney Road and Ballygudden Road and there are many different types of private houses in Castle Park, Woodvale Road and Beechleigh Park. Along the roads leading from the village are a variety of farm houses and detached houses recently built or renovated and valued at between Â£25000 and Â£60000.
